title: 8/29/17 - Do something that matters  (Live Houston coverage w/ Jason Buttrill)
description:
Can Americans tell the difference between good and evil anymore? ...What is going on at Burning Man? ...Who we really are from Rockport, Texas to New York City ...Darkness doesn't understand the light ...An important anniversary and what this audience has done in the past two years in saving Christians through the Nazarene Fund ... The left is blaming oil companies for Hurricane Harvey??? Madness. ...Levees breaking and flooding continuing to worsen in and around Houston ...All of the threats facing Houston residents as rain continues to fall there ...Define 'price gouging'.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
